name: Defence Against Raiders
description:
Defence from Raiders!

Raids are now a common occurence as the Roman Empire starts its decline. Many provinces are left to the hands of Visigoths. Making the Roman citizens face a dreadful end. 

As a commander of a garrison, you send soldiers to help defend those provinces that can not defend themselves. Beating waves of Visigoths over and over again.

How long will you hold?

Controls:

Left Mouse - Select province

RIght Mouse - De-select province

Goal: Click on provinces to send soldiers to aid the villagers
